mapper.insert: insert into sys_county (county_code, county_name, province_code, city_code, full_name, county_order, valid_flag, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sys_county set county_name = #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_order = #{countyOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_flag = #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where county_code = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select county_code, county_name, province_code, city_code, full_name, county_order, valid_flag, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_county where county_code = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
